title: Lance Zierlein evaluates recent QB draft classes & college players
itunes:title: Lance Zierlein evaluates recent QB draft classes & college players
description:
DJ is joined by NFL Media's Lance Zierlein on this new episode. First, the guys talk about trade rumors surrounding the Jets and look ahead to how the Jets can help QB Sam Darnold in the future (1:14). Then, the pair recap the Steelers' Monday Night Football win against the Dolphins and concentrate on Steelers' safety Minkah Fitzpatrick's big game (9:16). After, the duo discuss how the Houston Astros built their team and talk about the impact of veteran players being invested in younger players (10:35). Next, DJ and Lance look at the progress of quarterbacks from the 2017 and 2018 NFL Drafts (14:29). Then, Lance gives his takeaways from the current rookie QB class (23:03). Next, the pair talk about college players to watch out for (27:46). To wrap up, DJ reacts to the Bengals naming QB Ryan Finley their starter, while benching QB Andy Dalton (36:29).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
